communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: Incel_0022_4d7933's trajectory is marked by escalating aggression, fueled by repeated dating failures and deep-seated resentment towards societal norms around beauty and success. His physical self-description as short with a round face and big cheeks contributes to his body image issues, which he perceives as barriers to social acceptance. His intelligence, while acknowledged, does not mitigate his feelings of isolation and anger, pushing him further into the incel community where his views are reinforced.
narratives.p_intro: Meet incel_0022_4d7933, a self-described short, round-faced man with a keen intellect, whose online presence is dominated by aggressive rants against women and society. His posts are a mix of rapid-fire accusations and rhetorical questions, often laced with internet rage slang, reflecting his deep-seated anger and frustration with his dating failures and perceived social injustices.
